com.example.painintheass.menus

Class SkillsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.painintheass.menus.SkillsActivity

  • public class SkillsActivity
extends Activity
    This Activity is responsible for handling the creation of everything related to the skills menu. Including the UI manager, the view, the victory states, the skills, the AI, and the teams.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int countryID
      ID of the country which skills we are modifying.
